casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Edward Dean BELTON II. No. 542P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 31, 2006. Edward Dean Belton, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 24th day of January 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas and Motion for Temporary Stay, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Guilford County Superior Court:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st day of January 2006."
